Comments: Our school has been trying to order books that was from our fall book fair and we have submitted PO and list of books several times and no one seems to know anything about this.  I rec'd an email today that I should send a list with item numbers and the teacher ID# which it is being ordered from the school office of which I have the list of books and prices but no Item #.  Just frustrating that we can't get any answers and where are the emails with the PO's going to if noone can seem to find them?  Thank you!
very prompt responses regarding our order. thank you.

Just took a bit to determine which division of Scholastic the order should be placed with and where to send Purchase Order. Customer Service was kind, but it took a few tries to find someone who was able to locate which division of Scholastic to send the order to.
I can always count on Scholastic to meet the needs of my classroom.

I ordered 2 books, 1 for my Kindergartener son and 1 for my preschooler. I clearly found and chose both schools and teacher names for each book but only received book for my kindergartener son. I wrote to your customer support and only received reply that the other book was canceled which is very disappointing. My 3 years old was asking for his book and I had no answer for him. I ordered it from Amazon and received it 3 days later!! If I have to go through all this and order from Amazon, why I bother to order from you next time?
We are still in the middle of solving the problem.
I never received my order. It was mailed to the school and they don't have it.
It's ridiculous and disheartening that the books my son ordered were canceled at the last Moment due to them being part of the wrong 'months' catalog.
To many representatives. Not on the same page  Every one gives a different answer but

Great customer service isn't found in so many companies, but Scholastic answers questions quickly and accurately.  I've been impressed with getting an email back quickly and answering all questions I have.  I don't think it's always been the same person, but it seems those who are working in customer service are knowledgable and extremely helpful.  Thanks!

I have a $15 credit that was still available- I called to have them apply the credit but was able to do so because account sign in.  I was willing to give them my name account number and whatever needdd in order to have this completed.  To no avail.    Was instead charged an additional 22.98 on my credit card for the books.  Which was removed, but the entire process seemed little complicated then needed.   I will not be ordering books anymore with the resolution I was given.  I received the books, but not happy experience.   Will not be using this company anymore after the $15 credit that we paid for is used.     Should be fixed in an easier way for the customer experience.    To lose a lifetime customer for a simple $15 credit in my account is absurd
I never received the books and my son is very desapointed if you please look for my account Saddlewood elementary 3rd grade mrs rosario class ocala fl my email lisettebeltran1971@gmail.com
I got two books off your website and i have not received them yet
I continue to have issues ordering for our teachers. I had to cancel the last order for a teacher because it never went through, the teacher didn't get an email approval.
I really appreciated the fast and friendly response!
Everyone Who contacted me was extremely polite and helpful

I had a problem with my order because the teacher had no idea how to submit it so I had to send it to my home. Maybe if the info could be passed on so this isn’t a problem in the future for anyone else, a simple explanation sent to the teachers.
Make what the order has as a gift gets delivered. My son was looking forward to his free gift
The speed of the reply and the customer service representative having already addressed the issue even before reaching out was very impressive!

Never received book box and rep just said contact USPS because it said it was delivered. I explained that I did two orders and one came and the other did not and the rep responded back with a message that did not even help me. It was like they did not read it and just inserted pre written statement.

Never received book box and rep just said contact USPS because it said it was delivered. I explained that I did two orders and one came and the other did not and the rep responded back with a message that did not even help me. It was like they did not read it and just inserted pre written statement.

Thank you for looking specifically at the order. The original thought was that the duplicate item couldn’t be removed and instead I needed to cancel my entire order. I appreciate that the staff researched and saw that my duplicate item could be removed without canceling the entire order, thereby saving the order for classroom credit.  The error happened because I set up an account and order on another device. I then compiled my order on a different device and, when I logged in at checkout, the two orders combined. Not intended, but li understand how the error happened.
Did not receive free book with order

The reason I was so disappointed with my experience this time is that I placed an order for five items, and three were out of stock and therefore cancelled. I wanted to cancel the order and just re-order (I wanted to add some new things, and also, I ordered enough to earn a free book, but the free book was one of the cancelled items, and I was not able to replace it with something else). I think that policy isn't fair.
Have tried multiple times but get run around, purchased E wallet and was told could use left over funds online but cannot find the amount

I was disappointed that the books that I ordered were not available by the time they were sent to the classroom. The customer service person was fine but couldn't solve the problem. Books ordered in March were not shipped/ no longer available after order
My request was ignored. No one contacted me about order concern.

I ordered a chrome book with bonus points.  I was told it would be shipped within 2-4 weeks.  About 4-5 weeks later I contacted to find out the status and they told the item was backordered.  I did not receive any notice of this and was expecting this computer as my spouse needs one for work.  I was also told that they have no idea when it will come in and when it will be shipped to me.  Most companies I have dealt with in the past, let you know when an item is backordered.  I didn't receive any notice and thought that was bad customer support/service.
I was unable to use my bonus points.  They should be able to use across your entire website.
I received a reply asking for more information. I provided the needed information and have not received a further reply.

I asked if there will be June flyers mailed out eventually, since I know that Scholastic is not available sometime during the summer. The representative I chatted with said that they only knew about May flyers being available and wouldn't know about June until mid-May (but we could still look/order online.) I'm surprised that they didn't seem to know for sure what the schedule was.
Our Spanish Speaking community is requesting the Leo Flyers to be sent in hard copy not digital.
My Scholastic representative was able to quickly assist me and add a book onto an order I had already placed. Thank you!

I am not happy that I am not able to receive a hard copy in color of the Scholastic magazines in Spanish.  Yes, I know that I have this option, but I need to do this on line.  This is my 27 year in Education and at one point I would get them in Spanish.
Being able to look back at the book I have ordered in the past would be great.

I had a difficult time getting a quote form a live person. I needed a quote, fairly quick due to our school budget closing by the end of the following day. Customer service kept on telling me I needed to submit a request by email.  The problem was they did not know when or how long it would take to get a quote. It would be Great if in certain circumstances the live agents could give quqotes.

It was resolved as far as the policy was relayed to me. However, I am concerned with the policy. When purchasing the Book of the Week, I would like to purchase 10 copies, for example, yet I would be charged nearly double for shipping if I am not placing my order that week. And then on each week of the month, I can never purchase the Book of the Week due to this policy.

I've had issues with my account for quite some time now.  I somehow had an old account: 66181471, that I don't want anymore and has been deleted by your support staff. My current account, 7403788 that I've used for years without issues until the past year or two is what I want to continue to use.   Despite sharing only my new account link and class code: HPCB6, I am getting notifications in my school email that parents are ordering, but my cart is empty.   I got help with this in January and March thinking this was resolved, but it continues to be an issue. Is there anyway to fix this?  There is an order is showing up in my email saying to see that a student ordered, but my cart does not show anything. Help, please!
I would be able to tell if my order is tax exempt when I am placing it. I still do not have my credit on my credit card so I am not sure I am done.

I purchased a birthday coupon book and didn't realize that the coupons expire. I went to place an order for my students and noticed I can no longer use the coupons. I contacted customer service for assistance to (at least) get a credit and the customer service rep was not helpful considering how long I've been purchasing books from scholastic both as a teacher and as a parent.
Quick, efficient service.  Thank you for your help!
I was very happy with the outcome of my inquiry. Both Kim and Aubrianne were very friendly and personable.
Some of the books were out of stock so needed to order alternative books

I wish I could remember the name of the woman who helped me on Chat. She was amazingly efficient in helping reestablish my account so I could place my order.  She was obviously well trained, knowledgeable and I really appreciated it. :)
I mailed in a payment for a student order and it has still not posted to my account. The parent said the check has cleared.

The representative was very helpful.  The only reason my issue wasn't resolved is because my check is "lost in the mail."  I used an old pre-paid envelope not realizing the payment address has changed.  I hope it gets forwarded to the new address or returned to me.

I placed an order and didn't click that I was sending in a check and was charged on my personal card. I asked how this could be resolved but wasn't given any suggestions or solutions to my issue. I have done the live chat now and was told to wait for the check to arrive and my account will be credited. I was unhappy that I did not receive this helpful information the first time I reached out.

The website glitched when I submitted my order and there was a snowball effect. Your people did their best, but there had to be a lot of back-and-forth and a student didn't get one of his books because of this. I will always screenshot my submitted orders from now on!

We are tax exempt and I have tax being added to our order.  Other parts of Scholastic you can fax or scan in and email a purchase order to them and the tax is immediately removed.  I was told I have to wait until the order is shipped to get the tax removed.  Being that we get audited and tax is not allowed, that makes me nervous when ordering.
Please don't send material that is not appropriate for K-5.
I received an email stating that my question was received, but I still have not received an email regarding the quote that I requested.
nothing We received a bill that I was trying to figure out what it is for.  I have never received one like this.
All good!  Always enjoy working with Scholastic!

It was your error that caused me to call.  I didn't receive one of the ordered books.  I wish I didn't have to call or complete this survey at all. There were WAY TOO MANY choices listed from the automated call answerer.  It was too long.

I was told that I have to have a min order from students unless it is online, otherwise I pay the shipping out of my pocket. Teachers already spend so much of their own money on our classrooms, I will not pay 6.99 shipping for a $3 book. I ordered the kids book off of Amazon so they could have the book. I can not control how parents order, how much they can order. I can control if I choose to send home the flyers

I can not connect to my account to submit student book orders. The message is my password is incorrect, I have attempted to reset it but I never receive a reset email. Even after I asked for help the rep claims a reset email is sent. It has not been resolved.
Our school moved site locations this past week (a school had been remodeled for us to have our own site finally) and I was trying to change to our new address. It's not an option.

The customer service representative that helped me was wonderful. She listened to my problem and helped me solve it in just a few minutes. She also explained how to make the changes I needed in the future. I was very please with the service I received.
Order never came and now they say it is being returned.

The ordering process was a little difficult, at first no one could tell me where I needed to go to get a quote on the books I was trying to order for our vending machines. Wasn't very helpful sent me to two different Reps.

It seems like I contact customer support every time I place a big order because something is left out with no communication.  It makes me not want to place large orders.  But, customer service takes care of the issue so I guess I am happy about that.
Nothing. It was fine. The chat feature is efficient and the customer service rep was helpful.

Your agent sends me a response that says the order for the book was cancelled and that the parent will need to contact Scholastic!?!?!?  Are you kidding me?  If it was cancelled, why weren't the parents notified.  I have an angry parent that ordered on-line from you, and now they are mad at ME!  We all thought ordering on-line was supposed to be easier.  Now, this parent will tell other parents not to order.  Thanks for NOTHING!!!
Requested quote and was told we would have it within 1-2 days and it's been 4 days . Also unable speak to anyone on phone.

I do not want my order to be auto submitted as I like to collect as many orders as possible to maximize the total order amount in order to receive as many books as possible for my class. It's bothersome that the answer was simply "we can't"

I had a live chat with someone a few weeks ago who was able to resolve my login problem.  However yesterday the live chat did not resolve the same login problem.  I've used Scholastic faithfully for over 3 years now without any problems signing in/logging into your site and that has not been the case since March of this year.  I may stop using it in my classroom if it cannot be resolved.  I cannot always make a live call to get password, login information from your company, so I've tried the Live Chat twice and it worked once before, but yesterday it failed me most likely due to a policy your company has put in place.  If systems are not quick and easy to access, I find I do not have extra time in my day to resolve them.

I had called because an order has not arrived in over a month. The representative said they would resend the order. If the order arrives soon, I will be satisfied. The representative was helpful and prompt with their response. I had emailed a week and a half ago but never heard back. So now that I know there's a live chat feature and it was quickly resolved (I hope), I will use that in the future if needed.

I had called because an order has not arrived in over a month. The representative said they would resend the order. If the order arrives soon, I will be satisfied. The representative was helpful and prompt with their response. I had emailed a week and a half ago but never heard back. So now that I know there's a live chat feature and it was quickly resolved (I hope), I will use that in the future if needed.
The response from Scholastic was prompt and courteous.
I’m trying to order flyers. I’m new to doing this at the daycare center I am Director of.

The representative, Natalie, was perfectly fine. I contacted because I was ordering specific books, out of my pocket, for my students for their end of year gifts. I have ordered Weird School books quite a few times. Sometimes 25+ of the same title and have never had a issue with being able to use the bonus points no matter what book or price point. Speaking for myself, I spend a good bit of money of my own for my students and the bonus points help balance that out some. I know I don't order a lot, but feel less likely to encourage parents to order knowing that I will be limited as to what I can use them on. I understand that there are many others that I could use the points on, but I don't feel like it is beneficial for those whom it is supposed to aid.
1 I am waiting to hear when I will receive my first student flyers that I may give my second grade class so that we may place an order that will arrive before school ends.

I was on a wait list for 2 weeks and this morning received an email that Paquete Cuentos fonéticos™ de Scholastic is back in stock. I logged in to add it to my cart for my school and it isn't working. It says 1 is not a valid number. The rep was unable to find this book and asked for an item number. Your Site does not offer an item number so I gave the rep the web address. After waiting 10 minutes, she shared that she was unable to find it.   Why did I get an email that it is back in stock?   Is it back in stock and your website need support?   I am instructional coach looking to purchase 6 sets of these books for my school for our dual language population.   Please advise.  Mary Ellen Oczki
Problem was dealt with quickly and efficiently!
It was a very smooth process, and the representative was very friendly and helpful.  Thanks for a great product/company again!
It would have been better not sent the email with the incorrect information. none
Not send out a notification a book is ready and then hours later is not being available. Id like to text message when a book becomes available.
I was put on hold for my entire lunch break.  I never did get to place my order.  I had to hang up when my class came in for recess.
She was great!  She went above and beyone to help!
I wanted to find a book for my student from a previous flyer and I was  just left hanging…
I LOVE the chat feature.  It is quick and easy!  Your reps have been extremely friendly and helpful every time I have used chat!
A blanketed "I'm sorry you found this offensive" does not seem to amount to any sort of action that should take place.

Your financial system is crazy - so many different numbers - acct, cust, invoi, order , etc...plus so many different areas (teacher Store, book club, etc...) very hard to keep track of payment made /due and have to call often to get paid invoices.  Paid invoices should automatically be emailed to the acct holder once payment is received. without having to call and ask for it.
Always great customer service! Thank you for helping me out!

I received an email asking me to fill out this survey for an interaction yesterday but I did not receive an email reply yet from Scholastic. I sent this email but haven't heard back:   Dear Scholastic,  I just received order #73094883, and one of the items, ​Item #34L8 Sea Otters Stationery, is damaged. The item arrived opened, without any shrink wrap, and it is missing some of the items inside of it (sticky-note pads, etc).  Can you please send me a replacement item #34L8 (Sea Otters Stationery) to give to the student who ordered the item? She is disappointed that her item was damaged and missing some of the items that were supposed to be inside the stationery box.  Thank you,  Christa Knapp CUSTOMER NUMBER 1928659 I'm not sure if my problem is resolved or not! I sent this email yesterday but haven't yet heard back via email:  Dear Scholastic,  I just received order #73094883, and one of the items, ​Item #34L8 Sea Otters Stationery, is damaged. The item arrived opened, without any shrink wrap, and it is missing some of the items inside of it (sticky-note pads, etc).  Can you please send me a replacement item #34L8 (Sea Otters Stationery) to give to the student who ordered the item? She is disappointed that her item was damaged and missing some of the items that were supposed to be inside the stationery box.  Thank you,  Christa Knapp CUSTOMER NUMBER 1928659
The representative was very professional and helpful. My question was answered in a timely manner.
I appreciate the quick response to my concern about the missing order. Thank you.

I called about a shipping fee that I got sent a bill for. Apparently this was for an order for a $9 book for a student that was mailed in. I was told in an email from an agent that shipping is included on orders under $25. Then I was told on the phone that is correct and I owe $6.99. If shipping is included on orders under $25 then I shouldn't owe money. The representative was rude to me after I explained. I also do not understand why I, as a teacher, have to pay for shipping for a student's book order. I want books in the hands of my students, but not if I'm responsible to pay for shipping. I will likely not pass out book orders anymore because of this, which is sad for my students.

I called about a shipping fee that I got sent a bill for. Apparently this was for an order for a $9 book for a student that was mailed in. I was told in an email from an agent that shipping is included on orders under $25. Then I was told on the phone that is correct and I owe $6.99. If shipping is included on orders under $25 then I shouldn't owe money. The representative was rude to me after I explained. I also do not understand why I, as a teacher, have to pay for shipping for a student's book order. I want books in the hands of my students, but not if I'm responsible to pay for shipping. I will likely not pass out book orders anymore because of this, which is sad for my students.
I'd like the problem solved, not just a work around. I am not receiving the monthly flyers.
I did not feel listened to. I felt as if I had explained the situation but was given the same response as if I had not.

I haven't had my issue resolved. I am looking to receive the scholastic book selection flyers that go home to parents . We have about 150 families . Our preschool serves children from 6 weeks old- 8 years .  Thank you
Excellent customer service as always!  It is much appreciated.  Thank you!
If there is a way to not charge tax to schools, it would make the purchasing process easier.  Thank you.

When I contacted customer service I got the answers I needed, but I had to keep asking questions to understand the process for getting the books purchased for classrooms as tax exempt. It would have been helpful for them to explain the process right away. I also think that the process is too difficult. It needs to be easier for schools to order books as tax exempt without having to call to request the refund.
I’d like to be able to respond specifically to the customer service rep. who responded to my question instead a new email. This would be nice to thank them.
I really appreciate no questions asked, prompt responses, and quick actions!!
Customer Service was very quick to respond and solved my issue immediately. Thank you so much!
I'm wondering where the book order is. I have not received a book order.
My question was answered very quickly and the problem solved right away.

The phone person was awesome.  I have not found the online agents to be helpful at all.  I'm very busy as a teacher so I don't have time to get on the phone.  Itd be a 1 if I voted for chat support but 5 for phone support.

My only problem with Scholastic is in dealing with order numbers vs. invoice numbers, and getting payments applied quickly and correctly (and for us to be able to check). We are involved in a double charge to our school credit card right now (it's not showing as a credit balance on my account, so I don't know where the funds are), but it was charged twice to our school credit card. Getting issues like this resolved has been a major pain (this year and last year). Thanks
They solved my issue quickly and kindly!
I am not sure you can. The package was lost in the mail, I think.

You changed your policy and no longer allow teachers to pay the remainder if they don’t have enough bonus points for an item. It’s quite disappointing especially since this change was never advertised.

We need a better book selection for Spanish speaking preschoolers. We keep getting the same flyer for months, and there are very few age appropriate books that aren't part of packages.  Our students have $7 per month to spend from book trust and need better choices.
So grateful for the quick reply and plan to resolve my last package issue.
Quick responses and solved all issues.  Thanks!
allow us to enter tax exempt number online

I understand some offers expire, however, I truly would have appreciated some assistance or effort to get the item I needed. I asked if there was anyone who could help. You clearly still sell the books, I know that could be accommodated. I even said I understand pricing would be changed due to the expiration of the "deal". The person who responded to my emails didn't answer those questions for help or for a manager or anything. Simply here is a similar option which I did appreciate as a last resort. He or she wouldn't even check to see. Perhaps that is your policy - to be firm on the expiration of deals, but he never stated that either. I really need those same exact books for a district wide reading initiative but he only offered another pack with half of the amount of books for nearly the same price. That is fine as well for some of it, but I needed the other six and he offered no way for me to order them. It was discouraging is all. He was professional, but short in responses and didn't even answer many of the questions at all. The responses were matter of fact and offered no further assistance. See previous description for full details. I am needed a pack of books that I'm told is no longer available. I understand that deals expire. I could even get them for a different price if needed. I just needed 15 of this one book pack of Biscuit books. It was 12 books in shrink wrap. I am sure they still print those books even if individually and he offered a six pack only. I can probably make that work if those six are among the 12 original titles.

I started a chat with a rep about my bonus points being docked in my cart. The item in my cart is unavailable, but I am not able to delete it. The delete button is not there, so I cannot get rid of it, nor can I use the bonus points that it is currently "using" for that item. The bonus points are still being docked. A total of 825 points. She said it may be a few business days, and it has been 2, I believe. No movement has been made on my account, but it hasn't been the full time she said it would take yet, so that's fine. As far as the chat itself, there was minimal customer service etiquette. She wasn't rude, but she was not exactly thorough in her responses, and she left me hanging for a while. I had to ask if I needed to keep the chat open & what next steps would look like. She did ask me if I needed anything else before we disconnected.
The person in accounts was very quick and helpful!
I do not understand why I was billed twice.  I did not receive two sets of books.
The customer service rep was helpful and solved my issue quickly.

I have been receiving paper flyers for the parents in my name, Julie Baczewski since the fall.  Almost every month I have to call or email and remind Scholastic to send the paper flyers.  Each time they say they have made the adjustments and the next month they should come without issue and they don't.  This most recent time I emailed and was told that the account is not in my name that it is in the name of a former employee, Diana Adams.  Before she left, she told me she changed the account into my name and I had been receiving flyers in my name.  This time I was told the account is still in her name and that it can't be changed to my name I'd have to make a new account.  I just don't have time for this, so if it can't be resolved we will on linger be offering Scholastic books to our parents.  Thank you,  Julie Baczewski

For my initial question to be answered the first time. I question charging a shipping fee for teacher points orders only. We accumulate points based on the cash amount our parents spend with their orders. Many times we use our points to buy books as gifts for our children. Charging a shipping fee is outrageous when our parents have already paid the books and shipping through their initial orders.  Scholastic may no longer by the "Go to" for books when they can be purchased quicker through Amazon with free shipping. Scholastic needs to change their shipping policy.
The person who helped me was very helpful :) Solved my problem right away and kept my parent happy!!
We had a return but Scholastic does not offer free shipping or labels back to the warehouse. I think parents would appreciate this.
